stripped_text: Dividends 2 (When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it for each excess advancement counter.) When your discard phase ends, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to search R&D for 1 operation and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that operation to the top of R&D.
text: Dividends 2 (When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it for each excess advancement counter.) When your discard phase ends, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to search R&D for 1 operation and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that operation to the top of R&D.
title: Embedded Reporting
